a: Yes, all courses are 100% free to access.
Yes, you can download your certificate after completing a course.

q: Do I need to create an account?
a: No, you can enroll in courses without creating an account. Your data is stored locally in your browser.

q: What kind of courses are offered?
a: We offer courses in Web Development, Programming, Design, and more. All courses are curated from high-quality free resources.
Courses that are videos can be downloaded for offline viewing. Document-based courses require internet access.
